title: Selena Gomez reunites with ex boyfriend Samuel Krost in NYC
text:
She reportedly dated the fashion executive Samuel Krost from 2015 until it fizzled out months later.

And Tuesday night, Selena Gomez reunited with her ex Samuel at La Esquina restaurant in the New York City neighborhood of Soho.

The 27-year-old actress and singer rocked a black and white striped set as as she arrived with pals to the Big Apple eatery.

Selena Gomez reunited with her ex Samuel at La Esquina restaurant in the New York City neighborhood of Soho

Back on? She reportedly dated the fashion executive Samuel Krost from 2015 until it fizzled out months later; seen Tuesday night arriving to the same restaurant with his friends

Selena was seen arriving to the eatery with pals; soon after Samuel arrived with a group of friends.

The Lose You To Love Me songstress cut a stunning figure in her silky black and white pinstripe button up with coordinating bottoms.

The beauty added a pop of color with her bright red nail polish, adding pink matte lipstick to her pout and silvery smoky eye shadow beneath defined brows.

Selena, who rocked white sneakers and silver hoop earrings, wore her brunette tresses pulled back with a few face framing pieces loose around her face.

The pop star, who has dated Justin Bieber and The Weeknd, was first seen with Samuel in November 2015.

Nights like these: Selena posed for snaps with her friends inside the restaurant

Samuel, who attended New York University, was seen at a dinner outing with Selena, where the pop star momentarily sat on his lap after holding hands over the table, in November 2015.

Selena and Samuel, who founded fashion brand Krost, were also seen on vacation together in January 2016 along with a small group of pals.

The duo were snapped as they held hands in mid-January 2016 after a night of clubbing at 1Oak nightclub in Los Angeles.

By August of that same year, Samuel posted a message to his Instagram that he quickly deleted that reportedly said: 'Selena is a real girl with a real heart and real feelings. All you superficial who are just unhappy with your love lives, understand that love is real. Although we have ventured on separate paths, at least I know that love exists. I love you, Sel,' according to Elle.

The twosome even posed alongside each other in February at her best friend Courtney Barry's wedding.
